ygData.subject: Re: SV: [EverQuest] Legends
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, since I am only lvl 30 on my highest character, I may well be rich enough to spring for the big bucks when Barto reaches 55+. That is after I get the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, since I am only lvl 30 on my highest character, I may well be
rich enough to spring for the big bucks when Barto reaches 55+. That
is after I get the high-level uber-gaming-platform costing only 3-4K.
And a dedicated room. Oh, and a really nice chair. And maybe my wife
will come to like the game, and really support me in these little
expenditures.

Virtual/Alternate realities seem to be anchored by hard realities.
Money, or more particularly the absence of vast quantities of the
stuff. Time. Relationships and responsibilities.

Still, dreams are nice, and sometimes come true.
Sometimes.

Barto Proudfoot
Halfling Druid
Zeb Server (for the forseeable future).

--- In EverQuest@y..., "LAINE. Mikael (Nol)" <laine@e...> wrote:
> Wrong. Please read up before you spread your farts =P
>
> The regular servers will be updated as usual, the legend servers
will
> receive legend specific content that MAY be moved to normal servers
after
> awhile. They have hired extra staff (among 19 GMs, there hsould be
gms
> working 24/7 they say) that will ONLY be working with legend so
that it
> doesn't affect the normal servers.
>
> I've not been online much due to overloaded at work but it seems
fun, alot
> of nice events and good guilds. It's kinda easy to join a high-end
guild
> since about 80% of the server is level 60.
>
> It all looks very good so far.
>
> -----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
> Från: Richard Skelton [mailto:richards@h...]
> Skickat: den 6 mars 2002 16:33
> Till: EverQuest@y...
> Ämne: RE: [EverQuest] Legends
>
>
> Legend is $40 a month. ALL new content in Everquest will go into
Legend
> first, and normal servers will suffer because of it, only getting
new
> updates as they filter out from Legend. The new content and
improvements
> will obviously come through to regular servers slower than in the
past, in
> order for Verant to justify the high subscription to Legend and
keep those
> few elite and rich players interested.
>
> You might gather I dont subscribe to the Legend server :)
>
> Rykk Bloodfang
> 52 Monk
>
